description:
For sunny cragging or tough days on the trail, these wind-resistant, highly breathable shorts provide unrestricted freedom of movement. The fabric and construction have the durability and abrasion resistance needed for rough textured rock or unplanned bushwacking.

  • Stretch woven nylon (46% recycled content) and spandex ripstop is breathable and durable
  • Pull-on short with integrated web belt for adjustability and faux fly
  • Movement-mirroring stretch fabric moves with you
  • Drop-in mesh front pockets, back left drop-in and back right zippered pocket
  • UPF 50+ UV protection
name: Outdoor Research Ferrosi Shorts 7" - Men's
